name: SOG Specialty Knives & Tools ZM1001-CP Zoom Mini Knife with Straight Edge Assisted Folding 3.15-Inc

reviews.name: SOG Zoom Mini, Aluminum, Satin Folder
reviews.reviewText: An every day carry knife that is light, unobtrusive and incredibly easy to open quickly
reviews.title: Very quick operation

reviews.name: SOG Zoom Mini, Aluminum, Satin Folder
reviews.reviewText: After buying the Zoom mini for my soon, I returned two days later to buy one for myself. The speed/convenience of opening the blade and the balance and sharpness are amazing. This is now my carry knife.
reviews.title: Perfect balance, amazing opening speed

reviews.name: SOG Zoom Mini, Aluminum, Satin Folder
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this after seeing it at the Shot Show. Smooth operation and easy to handle. Excellent knife!
reviews.title: Light weight and smooth!
